page.title: 15FARMS AND FARMING,OXSHOTT(2)
page.content: Mr.S. of Arbrook Farm, Esher owns 45 acres in the centre of Oxshott which are used for wheat and grazing. Mr.B. of Horringdon Farm Claygate has a small amount of farm land in the north east corner of our area. Mr.D.of Dorset has a piece of land near Polyapes as well and he lets people use it as grazing fields for horses. {Clouds Hill Farm}consists of 140 acres. It is owned by Mrs. J who keeps 25 horses which she breaks-in and trains for running and jumping. There are no farmhouses on Oxshott farm land.
